Text:
Could you either Seed your Red Dwarf or tell everyone that this was all a time waster joke please. I'd be happy to hear either at this point...

Btw these aren?t brilliant quality; they look like analogue video recordings, Season 7 & 8 not too bad though.
Can someone with 100% please seed this, there are numerous people stuck on 96.3%!!!
Seriously, don't bother with this torrent, no-one has 100% you'll never finish downloading it. Honestly I don't know why people bother creating torrents when they don't look after them.
